lyric:
[00:09.70]Is it only in my dreams?
[00:12.00]Is it only in my head?
[00:14.29]Are you lonely
[00:16.94]When you're lying in my bed?
[00:19.04]Is it only for tonight?
[00:21.33]Gonna leave me disappointed
[00:23.78]Only
[00:26.38]To take it all away
[00:28.94]Close my eyes
[00:31.27]And I-I
[00:33.71]Keep my distance
[00:36.09]I-I
[00:38.35]Can't let go, I
[00:40.77]I-I
[00:43.10]Know you're not mine, but I
[00:46.57]I know that I'm being selfish
[00:48.89]And I know that you want me too
[00:51.09]Can't help, but to touch your body
[00:53.37]And I-I
[00:55.96]Can't help that I'm being selfish
[00:58.21]When I know that you want me too
[01:00.50]Can't help, but to want you on me
[01:02.73]And I-I
[01:05.35]Can't help that I'm so selfish
[01:09.97]Can't help that I'm so selfish
[01:15.52]Is it just another lie?
[01:17.77]Am I just another high?
[01:20.06]Are you lonely
[01:22.43]When you're holding him at night?
[01:24.90]When you run away from home
[01:27.12]Am I the one you go to
[01:29.55]Only
[01:32.30]Until the night is gone?
[01:34.79]Close my eyes
[01:36.77]And I-I
[01:39.50]Keep my distance
[01:41.59]I-I
[01:44.23]Can't let go, I
[01:46.54]I-I
[01:49.02]Know you're not mine, but I
[01:52.25]I know that I'm being selfish
[01:54.68]And I know that you want me too
[01:56.85]Can't help, but to touch your body
[01:59.21]And I-I
[02:01.77]Can't help that I'm being selfish
[02:03.89]When I know that you want me too
[02:06.33]Can't help, but to want you on me
[02:08.57]And I-I
[02:11.21]Can't help that I'm so selfish
[02:15.74]Can't help that I'm so selfish
[02:20.59]Can't help that I'm so selfish

[02:48.76]I know that I'm being selfish
[02:51.02]And I know that you want me too
[02:53.39]Can't help, but to touch your body
[02:55.55]And I-I
[02:58.16]Can't help that I'm being selfish
[03:00.29]When I know that you want me too
[03:02.57]Can't help, but to want you on me
[03:05.02]And I-I
[03:07.59]Can't help that I'm so selfish
[03:12.27]Can't help that I'm so selfish
[03:17.04]Can't help that I'm so selfish
[03:21.71]Can't help that I'm so selfish
tlyric:
[by:Mercredi]
[00:09.70]只有我这样想吗？
[00:12.00]只有我这样做吗？
[00:14.29]你感到孤单的时候
[00:16.94]你才会躺在我的枕边
[00:19.04]如果只缠绵这一晚
[00:21.33]留我一人徒增失望
[00:23.78]也请
[00:26.38]连失望也带走
[00:28.94]闭上眼睛
[00:31.27]我…我
[00:33.71]开始失去理智
[00:36.09]我…我
[00:38.35]不想让你走
[00:40.77]我…我
[00:43.10]知道你不属于我，但是
[00:46.57]我知道这样太过自私
[00:48.89]我知道你肯定也想拥有我
[00:51.09]情不自禁，开始想触摸你的身体
[00:53.37]而我…我
[00:55.96]情不自禁变得自私
[00:58.21]我知道你肯定也想拥有我
[01:00.50]情不自禁，开始想与你缠绵
[01:02.73]而我…我
[01:05.35]情不自禁变得自私
[01:09.97]情不自禁变得自私
[01:15.52]我是你的另一个谎言
[01:17.77]让我更想占有你
[01:20.06]你感到孤单
[01:22.43]晚上拥抱别人入眠
[01:24.90]当你离家寻找新欢
[01:27.12]我是你需要的那个人
[01:29.55]只求
[01:32.30]夜晚更漫长一些
[01:34.79]闭上眼睛
[01:36.77]而我…我
